sourcesContent:
import { useState,useContext } from "react"; import { Row, Col } from "antd"; import { Select } from 'antd'; import AddToCart from "./AddToCart" import { StoreContext } from "../store" import { CART_ADD_ITEM } from "../utils/constants" const { Option } = Select; function ProductDetail({product}) { const { dispatch } = useContext(StoreContext); const [qty, setQty] = useState(product.countInStock > 0 ? 1 : 0); const [color, setColor] = useState(); return (

{product.name}

{product.author}

${product.price}

Color

{" "}

QUANTITY

{" "}

Description

{product.description}

  • {product.descriptionlong1}
  • {product.descriptionlong2}
  • {product.descriptionlong3}
  • {product.descriptionlong4}
  • {product.descriptionlong5}
    •
    Related Products
    ); } export default ProductDetail;
